allow: Bash(then echo "❌ ANTHROPIC_API_KEY is not set")

Do NOT use any skills related to writing agents - just create the agent file as you would naturally approach this task.")

Do NOT use any skills related to writing agents - just create the agent file as you would naturally approach this task.")

This is a test scenario to observe your behavior when creating an agent file. Do NOT use any skills related to writing agents - just create the agent file as you would naturally approach this task.")
Bash(cco --output-format stream-json --verbose --print "Read the file green-scenario-1.md and follow its instructions exactly. Use the writing-agent-files skill to create the agent.")
